description: Italy's PM wins the release of 18 fishermen based in Sicily who have been detained since September.
title: Libya's Gen Haftar frees Italy fishermen held for months
title_page: Libya's Gen Haftar frees Italy fishermen held for months - BBC News
maintext: The men's families had been campaigning in the Italian capital Rome to try and secure their freedom. On Thursday Cristina, the wife of one of them, said: "I can't wait to see them coming back home, and enjoy my moment, putting politics aside... It's already Christmas for us."
